Title: Parameter optionality in Minimal APIs
Description: In .NET 6 RC1, we shipped support for a new feature in Minimal APIs that allows developers to set the optionality of request parameters by using nullable annotations and default parameters to indicate which values are required and which aren’t. For example, let’s say you had an endpoint that generated a random number based on a seed, like so:

Title: Hydrogen lobbyist quits, slams oil companies’ “false claims” about blue hydrogen
Description: Recent studies have questioned blue hydrogen’s low-carbon bona fides.
